import React from "react"; import image from "./image/asu.jpg" const HeroSection =()=>{ return(

HI, THERE
I'M ASHUTOSH SINGH

A FRONT-END WEB DEVELOPER creating interactive application and UI/UX.

) } export default HeroSection;
